container-title: This will show the New Project dialog which we see in Figure A-2. APPENDIX A: Using the Android Development Environment 265
title: We then create a new project by Selecting File ➤ New ➤ Project

container-title: We also set the Minimum Required SDK field to API 9 and the Theme to None
title: The New Project dialog 3. After clicking Next, we will be presented with the New Android Application dialog. Figure A-3 shows this dialog with the Application Name, Project Name, and Package Name fields all set
